segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and I can’t help but laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like it’s a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to care that her feet are getting wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her turn, so patient and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the scene outside the window is so calm compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a little slice of life, messy and real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t turn around too fast and scare the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR
